parameter.name: offset
parameter.description: The amount of data that has been uploaded so far.

parameter.name: mode
parameter.description: Selects what to do if the file already exists.

parameter.name: autoRename
parameter.description: If there's a conflict, as determined by mode, have the Dropbox server try to autoRename the file to avoid conflict.

parameter.name: clientModified
parameter.description: The value to store as the client_modified timestamp.

parameter.name: mute
parameter.description: If true, this tells the clients that this modification shouldn't result in a user notification.

parameter.name: close
parameter.description: If true, the current session will be closed, at which point you won't be able to call upload_session/append_v2 anymore with the current session.
